comments.content:
Is there any method to download map programatically i don't want to use MOBAC for download osmdroid.zip but download from my android application.
Is it possible to do this?
There's also the packager - see the wiki HowToUsePackager.  But if you want to write your own that's also possible.

There is no method to do this. You will have to write your own.

Stack Overflow is a more appropriate place for a question like this. Thank you.
